pinyin: yuan2 he2 xi4 bao1 xing2 wei1 sheng1 wu4

sentences.english: It is well known that the processes of transcription and translation are coupled in prokaryotes.
sentences.chinese: 原核生物轉錄與翻譯過程是耦聯的。

sentences.english: Sex may also be derived from prokaryotic processes.
sentences.chinese: 性別也可能是源於原核進程。

sentences.english: Cyanobacteria are autotrophic prokaryotes performing oxygenic photosynthesis similar to that of higher plants.
sentences.chinese: 藍藻是一類能進行光合放氧作用的原核生物。

sentences.english: The male pronucleus forms when the second meiosis is completed.
sentences.chinese: 第二次成熟分裂結束，雄原核出現。

sentences.english: In prokaryotic cell it will be 38ATP.
To clone gene of the TRAIL and construct its prokaryotic expression vector.
sentences.chinese: 目的克隆人TRAIL基因，構建其原核表達載體。

sentences.english: The cloning and expression of the gene encoding S japonicum tropomyosin had been successfully made.
sentences.chinese: 日本血吸蟲原肌球蛋白編碼基因克隆和原核表達成功。

sentences.english: White patches at the base of the chimney are microbial mats.
sentences.chinese: 噴口基部的白色斑駁是原核生物叢聚。

sentences.english: Only prokaryotes, such as bacteria, lack lysosomes .
sentences.chinese: 只有細菌這樣的原核生物纔沒有溶酶體。

sentences.english: The purpose of this experiment was to find out the best time for collection of miniature pig zygotes.
sentences.chinese: 本試驗擬探索出採集五指山小型豬原核胚的最佳時間。

sentences.english: Plantlike organisms include cyanobacteria in the kingdom Monera .
sentences.chinese: 類似植物體包括在原核生物界的氰細菌。

sentences.english: The activation of the oocyte was determined by pronuclear formation.
sentences.chinese: 已激活卵母細胞之判定，系以原核之形成予以確認。

sentences.english: A small, typically one-celled, prokaryotic micro - organism.
sentences.chinese: 一種很小的，以單細胞爲特點的原核微生物。

sentences.english: The microinjection work is still going on.
sentences.chinese: 目前原核注射工作仍在緊張進行中。

sentences.english: Simple Sequence Repeat is ubiquitous in prokaryotic and eukaryotic genomes.
sentences.chinese: 簡單重複序列廣泛分佈於原核和真核基因組。

sentences.english: The recombinant CYP3A4 plasmid was successfully cloned and effectively expressed in Rosetta(DE3)2pLysS.
sentences.chinese: 成功地使CYP3A4基因在原核系統中高效表達。
